page.title: 04A day in my life. (1)
page.content: My name is Sarah. Today was Friday.I got up about 7 o'clock and wore my normal clothes- a dress and cardigan.After I had got dressed I took my five teddy bears off my bed and made it.I then packed my bag and went downstairs. For breakfast that day I had cheese on toast and orange juice to drink. Then I put on my coat and started to walk to school.Once I was at school I took my coat off and put my things on my desk next to Sian Evans(she is my best friend)Just then the bell went and we lined up for assembly.After assembly we went down to class and got out our reading and read while we waited for Sir to come. Then we would do English for first lesson and then the bell would go at quarter to eleven then we would go out to play for about quarter of an hour.
